name: Bull On Parade
description:
Tired of being mistreated, a bull escapes from the abuse to take revange with his own horns. Break everything, including the bones of those filthy humans, they deserve it. But be aware of the guards, they'll try to stop you with their sleep darts, so get rid of them before they can get rid of you.

Credits:

Giovanni Friedrich - Music and Voice Effects

Guilherme Sehna - Game Design, Programming

João Rothmann - Art, Voice, Programming, SFXs

Lizy Novo - UI
